overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a diverse social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total of 3,580 followers. Engagement is varied across platforms, focusing on academic and research-related themes. Posts on LinkedIn tend to receive higher interaction, suggesting a professional audience is highly engaged with research developments and opportunities.
